member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException
member.summary: Exception thrown when tool parameters are invalid.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException.ParameterName
member.summary: Gets the parameter name that was invalid.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException.ExpectedFormat
member.summary: Gets the expected parameter type or format.

member.name: M:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a message.

member.name: M:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with parameter details.
member.param: The name of the invalid parameter.

member.name: M:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with full details.
member.param: The name of the invalid parameter.

member.name: M:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InvalidParametersException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an inner exception.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcMessage
member.summary: Base class for all JSON-RPC messages conforming to JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcMessage.JsonRpc
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON-RPC protocol version. Always "2.0" for JSON-RPC 2.0.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcRequest
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 request message.
member.remarks: A request object must have an id to correlate with the response.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcRequest.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the request identifier. Used to correlate requests with responses.
member.value: Can be a string, number, or null.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcRequest.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the method to be invoked.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcRequest.Params
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters for the method call.
member.value: Can be an object, array, or null if no parameters are needed.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcResponse
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 response message.
member.remarks: A response must contain either a result or an error, but not both.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcResponse.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier matching the request this response is for.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcResponse.Result
member.summary: Gets or sets the result of the method call.
member.value: Present only if the request succeeded. Mutually exclusive with Error.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcResponse.Error
member.summary: Gets or sets the error information if the request failed.
member.value: Present only if the request failed. Mutually exclusive with Result.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcError
member.summary: Represents an error in a JSON-RPC 2.0 response.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcError.Code
member.summary: Gets or sets the error code.
member.remarks: Standard error codes: -32700: Parse error -32600: Invalid Request -32601: Method not found -32602: Invalid params -32603: Internal error -32000 to -32099: Server error

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcError.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets a short description of the error.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcError.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets additional information about the error.
member.value: May contain detailed error information, stack traces, or context.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcNotification
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 notification message.
member.remarks: A notification is a request without an id. The server must not reply to a notification.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcNotification.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the method to be invoked.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.JsonRpcNotification.Params
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters for the method call.
member.value: Can be an object, array, or null if no parameters are needed.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ServerCapabilities
member.summary: Defines the capabilities supported by an MCP server.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ServerCapabilities.Tools
member.summary: Gets or sets the tools capability marker.
member.value: An empty object {} indicates tool support is available.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ServerCapabilities.Resources
member.summary: Gets or sets the resource capabilities supported by the server.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ServerCapabilities.Prompts
member.summary: Gets or sets the prompts capability marker.
member.value: An empty object {} indicates prompt support is available.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ResourceCapabilities
member.summary: Defines specific capabilities for resource handling.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ResourceCapabilities.Subscribe
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the server supports resource subscriptions.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ResourceCapabilities.ListChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the server can notify when the resource list changes.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeRequest
member.summary: Request to initialize the MCP connection.
member.remarks: This is the first request sent by the client after establishing a connection.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeRequest.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the MCP protocol version the client supports.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeRequest.Capabilities
member.summary: Gets or sets the capabilities supported by the client.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeRequest.ClientInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets information about the client implementation.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeResult
member.summary: Response to an initialization request.
member.remarks: Contains the server's capabilities and version information.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeResult.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the MCP protocol version the server supports.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeResult.Capabilities
member.summary: Gets or sets the capabilities supported by the server.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.InitializeResult.ServerInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets information about the server implementation.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ClientCapabilities
member.summary: Defines the capabilities supported by an MCP client.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ClientCapabilities.Roots
member.summary: Gets or sets the root directory capabilities.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ClientCapabilities.Sampling
member.summary: Gets or sets the sampling capability marker.
member.value: An empty object {} indicates sampling support is available.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.RootCapabilities
member.summary: Defines capabilities for root directory handling.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.RootCapabilities.ListChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the client can notify when the root list changes.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Implementation
member.summary: Contains information about a client or server implementation.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Implementation.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the implementation.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Implementation.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the implementation.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Tool
member.summary: Represents a tool that can be invoked by the client.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Tool.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique name of the tool.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Tool.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a human-readable description of what the tool does.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Tool.InputSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON Schema defining the tool's input parameters.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Resource
member.summary: Represents a resource that can be read by the client.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Resource.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI identifying the resource.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Resource.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the human-readable name of the resource.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Resource.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description of the resource.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Resource.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the MIME type of the resource content.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Prompt
member.summary: Represents an interactive prompt that can guide the user through complex operations.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Prompt.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique name of the prompt.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Prompt.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description of what the prompt helps accomplish.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.Prompt.Arguments
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments that can be provided to customize the prompt.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.PromptArgument
member.summary: Represents an argument that can be passed to a prompt.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.PromptArgument.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the argument.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.PromptArgument.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description of the argument's purpose.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.PromptArgument.Required
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this argument must be provided.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.CallToolRequest
member.summary: Request to invoke a specific tool.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.CallToolRequest.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the tool to invoke.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.CallToolRequest.Arguments
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments to pass to the tool.
member.value: Must match the tool's input schema.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.CallToolResult
member.summary: Result returned from a tool invocation.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.CallToolResult.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content returned by the tool.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.CallToolResult.IsError
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the tool encountered an error.
member.value: If true, the content contains error information.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ToolContent
member.summary: Represents a piece of content returned by a tool.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ToolContent.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the content type.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ToolContent.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text content.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ListToolsResult
member.summary: Result of a tools/list request.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ListToolsResult.Tools
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of available tools.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ListResourcesResult
member.summary: Result of a resources/list request.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ListResourcesResult.Resources
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of available resources.

member.name: T:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ListPromptsResult
member.summary: Result of a prompts/list request.

member.name: P:COA.Mcp.Protocol.ListPromptsResult.Prompts
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of available prompts.
